org.svvrl.goal.cmd

Interface GameSolverInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameSolverInterface, BigStepSolverInterface, ClassicalBuchiSolverInterface, DominionDecompositionSolverInterface, GlobalOptimizationSolverInterface, McNaughtonZielonkaSolverInterface, ReachabilitySolverInterface, RecursiveSolverInterface, SmallProgressMeasureSolverInterface

    public interface GameSolverInterface
    This interface defines a command-line plugin for game solvers.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns a simple description of the game solver provided by this interface.
      java.lang.String getHelp()
      Returns the help message of the game solver provided by this interface.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the unique name of the game solver provided by this interface.
      Properties getOptions(Context ctx, java.util.List<Expression> args)
      Returns options configured according to a list of command-line arguments.
      GameSolver<?> getSolver()
      Returns the game solver provided by this interface.
      void setDescription(java.lang.String desc)
      Sets the simple description of the game solver provided by this interface.
      void setHelp(java.lang.String help)
      Sets the help message of the game solver provided by this interface.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the unique name of the game solver provided by this interface.
      void setSolver(GameSolver<?> solver)
      Sets the game solver provided by this interface.

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns a simple description of the game solver provided by this interface. The simple description will be used in the help message of SolveExtension.
        Returns:
        a simple description of the game solver provided by this interface

        Parameters:

      • getOptions

        Properties getOptions(Context ctx,
                      java.util.List<Expression> args)
               throws EvaluationException
        Returns options configured according to a list of command-line arguments. This method is responsible to remove all accepted arguments from the input argument list.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context for the evaluation of the arguments
        args - command-line arguments
        Returns:
        options configured according to args
        Throws:
        EvaluationException - if there is any error in parsing the arguments
